urls Module¶

views Module¶

myway.apps.todo.views.add_list(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Allow users to add a new todo list to the group they’re in.

myway.apps.todo.views.del_list(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Delete an entire list. Danger Will Robinson! Only staff members should be allowed to access this view.

myway.apps.todo.views.external_add(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Allow users who don’t have access to the rest of the ticket system to file a ticket in a specific list. This is useful if, for example, a core web team are in a group that can file todos for each other, but you also want students to be able to post trouble tickets to a list just for the sysadmin. This way we don’t have to put all students into a group that gives them access to the whole ticket system.

myway.apps.todo.views.list_lists(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Homepage view - list of lists a user can view, and ability to add a list.

myway.apps.todo.views.reorder_tasks(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Handle task re-ordering (priorities) from JQuery drag/drop in view_list.html

myway.apps.todo.views.search(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Search for tasks

myway.apps.todo.views.view_list(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Display and manage items in a task list

myway.apps.todo.views.view_task(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

View task details. Allow task details to be edited.
